send.label: Send Button
send.comment: Include a Send button. The Send Button is available only on sites that use the JavaScript SDK.

layout.label: Layout style
layout.comment: determines the size and amount of social context next to the button

showfaces.label: Show faces
showfaces.comment: Show profile pictures below the button.

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

verb.label: Verb to display
verb.comment: The verb to display in the button. Currently only 'like' and 'recommend' are supported.

color.label: Color scheme
color.comment: The color scheme of the plugin.

num_posts.label: Number of posts
num_posts.comment: the number of posts to display by default.

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

height.label: Height
height.comment: The height of the plugin in pixels.

header.label: Header
header.comment: Show the Facebook header on the plugin.

border_color.label: Border color
border_color.comment: The border color scheme of the plugin, e.g #C4C1BC

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

height.label: Height
height.comment: The height of the plugin in pixels.

header.label: Header
header.comment: Show the Facebook header on the plugin.

border_color.label: Border color
border_color.comment: The border color scheme of the plugin, e.g #C4C1BC

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

show_faces.label: Show faces
show_faces.comment: Show profile pictures below the button.

border_color.label: Border color
border_color.comment: The border color scheme of the plugin, e.g #C4C1BC

stream.label: Stream
stream.comment: Show the profile stream for the public profile.

header.label: Header
header.comment: Show the Facebook header on the plugin.

url.label: Url
url.comment: Select URL source facepile to display friends.

size.label: Size
size.comment: Determines the size of the images and social context in the facepile.

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

max_rows.label: Max rows
max_rows.comment: The maximum number of rows of profile pictures to show.

width.label: Width
width.comment: the width of the plugin, in pixels

height.label: Height
height.comment: The height of the plugin in pixels.

xid.label: Xid
xid.comment: If you have multiple live stream boxes on the same page, specify a unique `xid` for each.

always_post_to_friends.label: Always post to friends
always_post_to_friends.comment: If set, all user posts will always go to their profile. This option should only be used when users' posts are likely to make sense outside of the context of the event.
